name: Electromaze Tower Defense
description: Electromaze Defense is a classic tower defense game where you create your own maze. With a wide variety of maps, towers and upgrades, Electromaze Defense will keep you hooked for hours on end! Can you build the perfect maze?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and newer Processor: 2.2GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRAM Storage: 200 MB available space
